column4: i'm looking for a tool that allows extracting data out of a faulty cd/dvd (i can't mount [it get stuck], although in windows i -can- view the contents of the dvd [i can't fully read them though])
you could try (in windows) creating an iso, and then mounting that?
the disc is faulty [parts of it are not readable], i don't know any windows application that could generate a "partial" iso...
